= Enhanced Incoming Mail Handler

Extend support of incoming emails that generate new Issue to include inline images and simple html tags (i.e. <b>, <i>, <del>)

= Requirements

This plug was developed for chiliproject version 2.6 and it was effectively test with that version, but it should work without problems in higher versions.

= Installation

- Download the plugin
- Install the plugin as described at: http://www.redmine.org/wiki/redmine/Plugins
- Add to [CHILI ROOT]/app/controllers/mail_handler_controller.rb#index the hook that will trigger the plugin, i.e.:
  def index
    call_hook(:controller_mail_handler_new_before_save, { :params => params, :issue => @issue })
  ...
  end 
- Restart chili
